document_data.name: Gondroller
document_data.creator: [[Church of Gond]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Gondrollers''' were a type of [[humanoid]]-powered, three-wheeled vehicle developed by the [[Church of Gond]] that required relatively smooth trails.
document_data.Description: These vehicles had soft, squashy fat tires and rear cargo beds.
document_data.Availability: Genuine gondrollers were rather rare and expensive, being only constructed and sold by temples of [[Gond]]. Those who saw them would often try to hire a smith to create them a knock-off, but even these were rare due to the difficulty of making the vehicle's necessary [[axle]]s, wheels, and tires.
